about_the_game:
Take on the challenge of serving a crowd of hungry restaurant goers, with a twist! Start each round with an order you have to get done, but be careful where you are walking, because once this order is finished, time will rewind and you will have to make a whole new order while avoiding your previous self who is making the order you just completed, exactly in the same route you just took! 

This top-down cooking game is the closest a kitchen will ever be to feeling like a bullet hell.
detailed_description:
Take on the challenge of serving a crowd of hungry restaurant goers, with a twist! Start each round with an order you have to get done, but be careful where you are walking, because once this order is finished, time will rewind and you will have to make a whole new order while avoiding your previous self who is making the order you just completed, exactly in the same route you just took! 

This top-down cooking game is the closest a kitchen will ever be to feeling like a bullet hell.
name: Borrowed Thyme

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Any, single core required
  • Graphics: Any.
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Any, single core required
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: Ever been trying to cook with other people and felt the work would go much better if everyone was copies of you? With HyperDine, this can be a reality! Cook and serve dishes, but be careful where you walk because in just a minute, you'll be needing to avoid your past self or risk ruining everything!
